name: Action Recommendation Agent (LLM)
description: Analyzes account data and health analysis to recommend specific next actions using an LLM.

authSchemes.description: No authentication required for this agent.

skills.name: Recommend Account Actions
skills.description: Generates prioritized, actionable recommendations based on account context and analysis.

account_id.description: The unique identifier of the account being processed.

dynamics_data.description: Structured data from Dynamics Fetcher (Account, Contacts, Opportunities, Cases).

external_data.description: Structured data from External Enricher (News, Intent Signals, Technologies).

account_analysis.description: Analysis results from Account Analyzer (Risk, Opportunity, Engagement levels, Summary).

account_briefing.description: (Optional) The textual briefing generated by the Briefing Generator Agent for additional context.

recommended_actions.description: A list of recommended next actions for the account.

action_description.description: A clear, concise description of the recommended action.

rationale.description: The reason why this action is recommended based on the input data.

priority.description: The priority level of the action.

related_record_id.description: The ID of the related Dynamics record (e.g., Opportunity ID, Case ID), if applicable.
